text: is a Japanese competitive sailor. She competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro, in the women's 470 class. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female sailors (sport) Category:Olympic sailors of Japan Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Olympics – 470 Category:Asian Games medalists in sailing Category:Sailors at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan
title: Miho Yoshioka
